titles.title: Jesus Keep Me Near The Cross

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}In the cross In the cross Be my glory ever Till my raptured Soul shall find Rest beyond the river{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Jesus keep me Near the cross There a precious fountain Free to all a healing Stream Flows from Calv'ry's Mountain{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Near the cross a Trembling soul Love and mercy found me There the bright and Morning star Sheds its beams Around me{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Near the cross O Lamb of God Bring its scenes Before me Help me walk from Day to day With its shadow o'er me{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Near the cross I'll Watch and wait Hoping trusting ever Till I reach the Golden strand Just beyond the river{/lang-eng}
